bottom_navigation.shareContent: Post Services & Earn Extra Income Easily

service_type_description.home_cleaning: Enjoy a spotless home with thorough cleaning services tailored to your needs, leaving every corner fresh and pristine.
service_type_description.aircon_servicing: Keep your AC running smoothly with expert repair and maintenance, ensuring cool, clean air all year round.
service_type_description.move_in_out_cleaning: Make moving stress-free with deep cleaning for your old or new space, readying it for the next chapter.
service_type_description.sofa_cleaning: Revive your sofa with professional cleaning, removing stains and allergens for a fresh, cozy feel.
service_type_description.mattress_cleaning: Sleep better with a sanitized mattress, free of dust mites and allergens, cleaned to perfection.
service_type_description.curtain_cleaning: Brighten your space with expertly cleaned curtains, removing dust and grime while preserving fabric quality.
service_type_description.car_washing: Give your car a showroom shine with efficient washing services, inside and out, for a spotless ride.
service_type_description.disinfection_service: Protect your space with thorough disinfection, eliminating germs and ensuring a safe, healthy environment.
service_type_description.landscaping_service: Transform your outdoor space with expert landscaping, creating a beautiful, functional yard you’ll love.
service_type_description.handyman_services: Fix it fast with skilled handyman services for repairs, installations, and home improvements done right.
service_type_description.painting_services: Refresh your space with professional painting, delivering flawless finishes and vibrant colors.
service_type_description.moving_service: Move with ease using reliable services, handling your belongings with care from start to finish.
service_type_description.flooring_services: Upgrade your floors with expert installation and repair, ensuring durability and style.
service_type_description.pest_control: Eliminate pests safely and effectively with professional control services for a pest-free home.
service_type_description.elderly_care: Provide compassionate care for seniors, ensuring comfort, safety, and support tailored to their needs.
service_type_description.child_care: Trust your little ones to nurturing childcare, offering fun, safety, and learning every day.
service_type_description.full_time_maid: Enjoy daily help with a dedicated maid, keeping your home clean and organized effortlessly.
service_type_description.nurse: Receive expert care from skilled nurses, providing medical support and assistance for your health needs.
service_type_description.renovate: Renovate your space with expert services, transforming your home with quality upgrades and improvements.
service_type_description.pet_grooming: Keep your pets looking and feeling their best with professional grooming services, ensuring cleanliness, comfort, and style.

overview.main: It’s easy to get started on Allcareok
overview.content_1: Provide basic information, such as the types of services offered and the service areas covered.
overview.content_2: Upload at least one photo, along with a title and description—we’ll assist you with the rest.
overview.content_3: Verify a few details, then share your service listing with the world.

listing_editor_card.title: Title
listing_editor_card.photo_upload_description: Upload your service poster with contact info, service details, and coverage area. Include real case photos to assist customers.
listing_editor_card.delete_left_content: Once you delete a service, there is no going back. Please be certain.
listing_editor_card.delete_right_content: The service, along with its image and all associated information, will be permanently deleted. This action is irreversible and cannot be undone.
listing_editor_card.boosts_card_content: Find the ideal plan to boost your services.
listing_editor_card.area_content: Please clearly mention your service area, as customers often look for services by location.
listing_editor_card.service_type_title: Select the services you offer. This information is essential for customers to find and connect with your service ads.
listing_editor_card.service_contact_title: Please include your contact details, social media links, website, and email to make it easy for customers to connect with you and learn about your services.
listing_editor_card.contact_empty_title: No contact or social links. Add some!
listing_editor_card.service_description_title: Clearly describing your services allows customers to quickly understand the information, build trust, and get in touch with you.
listing_editor_card.verify_pending: Your ad has not been verified
listing_editor_card.verify_review: Your ad is currently being reviewed by our team.
listing_editor_card.verify_approved: Your ad has been successfully verified and is now live.
listing_editor_card.verify_rejected: Your ad verification was unsuccessful. Please check the details and try again.
listing_editor_card.youtube_description: Add a link to a YouTube video showcasing your services. This can help attract more customers and provide a better understanding of what you offer.
listing_editor_card.upload_limit_description: You can only upload up to 10 photos.
listing_editor_card.ad_limit_description: You can only add up to 10 services.
listing_editor_card.verify_upload_content: Advertisers need to upload necessary identification or business documents
listing_editor_card.verify_btn_content: Our team will review the submitted documents to ensure they meet the validation requirements.
listing_editor_card.payment_success_content: Thanks for your payment! Your documents will be reviewed within 1-3 business days.
listing_editor_card.approved_content: Congrats! Your application is approved, verification status is now visible on your ads.
listing_editor_card.rejected_content: Sorry, your application was rejected. Contact allcareok@gmail.com or resubmit.
listing_editor_card.payment_submit_content: Submit at least one document photo for review before making a payment.

understanding.title: Understanding Verified Ads
why_content: Credibility: Verified ads confirm the legitimacy of services or products, enhancing trust between users.
Visibility: Verified ads are often ranked higher in search results, ensuring they reach a wider audience.
User Confidence: Ads that are reviewed and approved give customers greater confidence to engage.
process_steps: Document Submission: Advertisers must upload the necessary identification or business documents, such as an ID card, passport, or company registration proof.
Review Process: Our team will review the submitted documents to ensure they meet the verification requirements.
Approval: Once approved, the ad will receive a 'Verified' badge, increasing its visibility.
understanding.failed_verification_content: If your ad fails verification, don’t worry! You can review the feedback, make the necessary corrections, and resubmit your documents. Resubmitting documents is free, but each verification request requires a $5 fee for the review process.
benefits_content: Credibility: Builds trust between service providers and customers.
Enhanced Visibility: Increases the likelihood of reaching a broader audience.
Better User Experience: Creates a secure and professional environment for transactions.

question_ranking.title: Understanding Ad Ranking
why_content: Visibility: Higher-ranked ads appear prominently in search results, capturing more attention.
Value: Targeted exposure increases the chances of successful customer engagement.
Flexibility: Users can select ranking plans that suit their needs and budget.
process_steps: Plan Selection: Advertisers choose from our Free, Plus, or Pro ranking plans based on their preferences.
Payment: Complete a secure payment for your selected plan.
Ranking Upgrade: Ads are automatically upgraded and placed higher in search results upon successful payment.
question_ranking.failed_verification_content: If you face issues with your payment, please contact our support team at allcareok@gmail.com. Note: Payments are non-refundable, so ensure your selection is accurate before completing the transaction.
question_ranking.payment_content: Payments for ranking plans are final and non-refundable. Upon successful payment, the ranking date will automatically renew, extending your ad's visibility duration. For assistance with payment-related issues, please contact our support team at allcareok@gmail.com.

boosts_right.title: Boost Your Ad to Top Rankings!
boosts_right.content: Boost Your Ads with a Custom Plan for Top Search Placement.
boosts_right.days_left: Days Left of Top Search Ranking!

plan_free.description: Free Starter Plan: Perfect for New Users to Try!

plan_plus.description: Unlock the excitement of top rankings for an entire week!

plan_pro.description: Achieve top rankings for 30 days and maximize your ad’s visibility!

view_ad.title: View
view_ad.content: View your ad as it appears to customers.

wishlist_toast.title: Added to Wishlist!
wishlist_toast.description: You can find this advertisement in your wishlist page.

wishlist_toast_remove.title: Removed from Wishlist!
wishlist_toast_remove.description: This advertisement has been removed from your wishlist.

wishlist_empty.title: Wishlist is Empty
wishlist_empty.description: You haven’t added any ads to your wishlist yet.

search_not_found.title: Search Ads Not Found
search_not_found.description: The search did not return any ads matching your criteria.

support.title: Get Support
support.description: We are here to assist you during our business hours. Please feel free to contact us for any questions or issues you may have.

ad_page.verify: Ads verified by AllCareOK ensure trust and quality in every listing.
ad_page.report_modal_title: Why are you reporting this advertisement?
ad_page.report_modal_content: This won’t be shared with the host.
